Description.Name: RATs, ROOTKITS and WORMS...
Description.Details: A knock sounds on your office door and you look up to see [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] standing there, "Come in, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], what's on your mind?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] comes in and stands before your desk, "Well Sir, as you know, before I hired on with {COMPANY.CompanyName}, I associated with some, shall we say, less than favourful people." You motion for them to take a seat and continue. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] sits and resumes talking, "Anyways, I was pretty close to one of them and they have contacted me telling me of some information that they found out about {COMPANY.CompanyName} and the Argo and I thought it wise to present it to you." You lean back in your chair, "What is this information then?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] seems a bit nervous as they continue, "So my friend says that they found a file in the Commercial Jumpship Transit Authority database which has our company and the Argo flagged." Your expression hardens, "Let me guess, your so-called friend wants money to make that file disappear? Are you trying to shake me down, MechWarrior?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is shocked, "Gosh no, Commander! I may have had a coloured past, but I left that life behind me. If I were trying to extort this company, I would not be here telling you this, it would have been delivered via a RANSOMWARE packet or similar means. I assure you, this, as much as it seems suspect, is legit." You relax a bit, "I suspect there is a BUT in that explanation somewhere." [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] nods, "Unfortunately yes, Commander. Try as I might, my former so-called friends still want to be paid for anything they do to change or remove that file." You snort, "I guess I can't really expect a group of hackers to do anything for free eh? " You push a button on your desk console, "Darius, get in here." A few moments later Darius enters your office, "Yes, Commander?" You motion for Darius to sit down before turning back to [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], "So, how much do they want, and what precisely can they do for us?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] responds, "There are a couple of things they can do, with the varying cost based on how many auditors have been assigned your case: Reset the marker on jump costs back to ¢25,000 per jump. You may still get a followup flag from the CJSTA, but you'll not be spending a ton of extra C-Bills on travel. Expect a fee of up to ¢5,000,000. The other option is a complete wipe of your file and audit trail. This is the most extensive cover-up and as such can cost close to ¢7,500,000. You'll only be contacted by the CJSTA again if you keep traveling the way you have been that got you flagged in the first place. I'll relay your choice to my former associates."

Description.Name: Erase marker, may cost up to ¢5,000,000
Description.Details: Have [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] Hire the Hacker

Description.Name: Hack CJSTA Database ¢4,975,232
Description.Details:
You mull over the options before you, "Let's try not to risk drawing extra attention.  We will opt for the first option.  Darius, coordinate with [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] to have them hack into the CJSTA database and expunge the details relating to our increased jump costs."

Darius nods, "Yes, Commander."

You look over at [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], "Thank you for bringing me this information.  You can coordinate with Darius to get all of this in motion."

[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] nods, "I will inform my former associates, Commander, but from here on out, Darius will be able to commincate directly with group.  As I said, I have no desire to go back to that version of my life."  As [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] stands up, they hold out a datakey, "This datakey will allow you to get in touch with the group if you ever needt them again in the future."

You motion Darius to take the datakey and they both depart your office.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

The next day, Darius returns to your office, "Commander, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] was able to get in touch with one of thier contacts who happended to be on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]. Everything went as promised and they were successful in reseting the jump costs on our file with the CJSTA back to ¢25,000 per jump."

You smile, "Excellent news, ¢5,000,000 is a bit steep, but we should be able to recoup that with the lower travel costs."

A grin appears on Darius' face, "Well you'll like this then, the fee was only ¢4,975,232."

You grab a couple glasses and the bottle of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGBL],Glengarry Black Label]] out of your desk drawer, "That is good news indeed!"

Everything went as promised and they were successful in removing all negative marks on our file with the CJSTA." You smile, "Excellent news, ¢7,500,000 is a bit steep, but at least we don't have to worry about being blacklisted." A grin appears on Darius' face, "Well you'll like this then, the fee was only ¢6,056,304." You grab a couple glasses and the bottle of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGBL],Glengarry Black Label]] out of your desk drawer, "That is good news indeed!"

Everything went as promised and they were successful in removing all negative marks on our file with the CJSTA." You smile, "Excellent news, ¢7,500,000 is a bit steep, but at least we don't have to worry about being blacklisted." A grin appears on Darius' face, "Well you'll like this then, the fee was only ¢7,319,986." You grab a couple glasses and the bottle of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGBL],Glengarry Black Label]] out of your desk drawer, "That is good news indeed!"

Description.Name: Decline the Offer
Description.Details: No Thanks

Description.Name: Decline Offer for now
Description.Details:
You think over the offer [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] has brought to you, "Darius, can we afford either of these options right now?"

Darius quickly checks his datapad, "Well, we can but as it is not a budgeted expense, it will set us back a fair bit.  Unless you really feel it a necessary means to an end, you may want to hold off and see how things continue to go with the CJSTA."

You turn to [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], "Thank you for bringing this offer to me.  Your a dependable MechWarrior.  I think for now, we will hold off and decline getting your former associates involved in this.  Please thank them and perhaps in the future we may find their talents useful."

[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] smiles and nods, "Understood Commander, but as I mentioned earlier, I have no desire to walk that path of my life again."  [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] stands, and holds out a datakey, "You can use this to contact them if the need arises, Commander."

You motion Darius to take the datakey, "Thank you again, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]."

Description.Name: Refuse the Offer
Description.Details: Not Going to Happen

Description.Name: Refuse Offer
Description.Details:
You think over the offer put forth to you, " [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], thank you for bringing this offer to me.  Your a dependable MechWarrior and I know how hard it must have been to even relay information from a group you have severed ties with.  I think it best we distance ourselves from them as well.  We will not be needing their services."

[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] smiles and nods, "Understood Commander, my duty has been and always will be to you and {COMPANY.CompanyName}."

Darius, looking a bit confused as to why he needed to be here, gets up and leaves with  [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]].
